text: Adaptive builds electronic trading

systems for the financial services,
capital and commodity markets.

Adaptive's use of AWS
enables us to compete with firms

many years older and many,
many times bigger than us.

We can make systems
that are globally scalable

and able to serve clients wherever they
are in the world at whatever time of day.

This is a capability that a business like ours
of about 240 people would've found

completely impossible,
15 or 20 years ago

One of the most exciting things about AWS
is exactly how much is possible
that wasn't before.

A huge range of previously
uneconomically viable initiatives,

capabilities, products,
platforms, solutions that capital markets

and financial services participants are
crying out for are now able to be built

simply because of the reduction in cost
and the time taken to build them.
It makes for a far more innovative market.

You can easily
spend 4, 5, 6, 7 million in the first year

just deploying hardware
and equally you can also take 9, 10,

18, 24 months getting that hardware
ordered, deployed and connected.
With AWS, you simply get started.

We knew that moving to AWS
would greatly increase the velocity

We knew that moving to AWS
would greatly increase the velocity

and reduce the cost of how
we deliver these trading platforms.

And with that as our North Star,
we were able to invest properly

in our internal teams' knowledge
and capabilities

to make sure that that benefit
showed up for our clients.
Our teams internally love working with AWS.

They find the APIs
and the functionalities fantastic.
And the way that it lets us

focus on providing differentiated business
value for our clients

on top of the AWS
platform is absolutely fantastic.
